languages.text: "Скверный сюжет. Как режиссеру этой пьесы... мне глубоко противен сей исход". {n}Арлекин задумчиво склоняет голову.{/n} "Твои слова ладны, мон-кай. Но что ответят на это твои спутники?"

traits.locale_text: "Скверный сюжет. Как режисеру этой пьесы... мне глубоко противен сей исход". {n}Арлекин задумчиво склоняет голову.{/n} "Твои слова ладны, мон-кай. Но что ответят на это твои спутники?"
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "An ugly plot, to be sure. As the one who directs this play... I would be deeply offended by such a resolution." {n}The Harlequin lowers his head in thought.{/n} "Your words are harmonious, mon-keigh. But what will your companions say?"
languages.original_text: "Скверный сюжет. Как режиссеру этой пьесы... мне глубоко противен сей исход". {n}Арлекин задумчиво склоняет голову.{/n} "Твои слова ладны, мон-кай. Но что ответят на это твои спутники?"

traits.locale_text: "An ugly plot, to be sure. As the one who directs this play... I would be deeply offended by such a resolution." {n}The Harlequin lowers his head in thought.{/n} "Your words are harmonious, mon-keigh. But what will your companions say?"
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: 「確かに酷い筋書きだな。この劇を監督する者として…そんな解明部なら僕はひどく不愉快になるよ」{n}ハーレクィンは頭を低くして思案する。{/n}「君の言葉は調和が取れてるね、モン＝ケイ。でも、お仲間は何て言うかな？」
languages.original_text: "An ugly plot, to be sure. As the one who directs this play... I would be deeply offended by such a resolution." {n}The Harlequin lowers his head in thought.{/n} "Your words are harmonious, mon-keigh. But what will your companions say?"

traits.locale_text: 「確かに酷い筋書きだな。この劇を監督する者として…そんな解明部なら僕はひどく不愉快になるよ」{n}ハーレクィンは頭を低くして思案する。{/n}「君の言葉は調和が取れてるね、モン＝ケイ。でも、お仲間は何て言うかな？」
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: “这确实是个邪恶的阴谋。身为这场戏剧的引导者……我对这样的前景感到深恶痛绝。”{n}丑角低下头，深思着。{/n}“你的话充满了和谐之意，猴子，但你那些同伴是怎么想的呢？”
languages.original_text: "An ugly plot, to be sure. As the one who directs this play... I would be deeply offended by such a resolution." {n}The Harlequin lowers his head in thought.{/n} "Your words are harmonious, mon-keigh. But what will your companions say?"

traits.locale_text: “这确实是个邪恶的阴谋。身为这场戏剧的引导者……我对这样的前景感到深恶痛绝。”{n}丑角低下头，深思着。{/n}“你的话充满了和谐之意，猴子，但你那些同伴是怎么想的呢？”
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: « Une manœuvre des plus odieuses. En tant que metteur en scène... un tel dénouement serait pour moi une insulte. » {n}L'Arlequin baisse la tête, perdu dans ses pensées.{/n} « Vos paroles sont harmonieuses, mon-keigh. Mais qu'en pensent vos compagnons ? »
languages.original_text: "An ugly plot, to be sure. As the one who directs this play... I would be deeply offended by such a resolution." {n}The Harlequin lowers his head in thought.{/n} "Your words are harmonious, mon-keigh. But what will your companions say?"

traits.locale_text: « Une manœuvre des plus odieuses. En tant que metteur en scène... un tel dénouement serait pour moi une insulte. » {n}L'arlequin baisse la tête, perdu dans ses pensées.{/n} « Vos paroles sont harmonieuses, mon-keigh. Mais qu'en pensent vos compagnons ? »
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: «Un desarrollo indigno, sin duda. Como director de esta obra... me ofendería profundamente dicho desenlace». {n}El Arlequín agacha la cabeza, pensativo.{/n} «Tus palabras rebosan armonía, mon-keigh, pero ¿cuál será la opinión de tus compañeros?».
languages.original_text: "An ugly plot, to be sure. As the one who directs this play... I would be deeply offended by such a resolution." {n}The Harlequin lowers his head in thought.{/n} "Your words are harmonious, mon-keigh. But what will your companions say?"

traits.locale_text: «Un desarrollo indigno, sin duda. Como director de esta obra... me ofendería profundamente dicho desenlace». {n}El Arlequín agacha la cabeza, pensativo.{/n} «Tus palabras rebosan armonía, mon-keigh, pero ¿cuál será la opinión de tus compañeros?».
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Ein hässlicher Plan, das steht fest. Als Regisseur dieses Theaterstück ... wäre ich von einer solchen Auflösung schwer beleidigt." {n}Der Harlekin senkt nachdenklich den Kopf.{/n} "Eure Worte sind harmonisch, Chem-Pan-Sey. Aber was werden Eure Gefährten sagen?"
languages.original_text: "An ugly plot, to be sure. As the one who directs this play... I would be deeply offended by such a resolution." {n}The Harlequin lowers his head in thought.{/n} "Your words are harmonious, mon-keigh. But what will your companions say?"

traits.locale_text: "Ein hässlicher Plan, das steht fest. Als Regisseur dieses Theaterstück ... wäre ich von einer solchen Auflösung schwer beleidigt." {n}Der Harlekin senkt nachdenklich den Kopf.{/n} "Eure Worte sind harmonisch, Chem-Pan-Sey. Aber was werden Eure Gefährten sagen?"
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Pek nahoş bir entrika bu, orası kesin. Bu piyesi yönetene gelecek olursak... Böylesine bir final, beni son derece gücendirirdi." {n}Arleken, düşüncelere dalarak başını eğiyor.{/n} "Sözlerin kulağa ahenkli geliyor mon-keigh. Peki ya yoldaşların buna ne diyor?"
languages.original_text: "An ugly plot, to be sure. As the one who directs this play... I would be deeply offended by such a resolution." {n}The Harlequin lowers his head in thought.{/n} "Your words are harmonious, mon-keigh. But what will your companions say?"

traits.locale_text: "Pek nahoş bir entrika bu, orası kesin. Bu piyesi yönetene gelecek olursak... Böylesine bir final, beni son derece gücendirirdi." {n}Arleken, düşüncelere dalarak başını eğiyor.{/n} "Sözlerin, kulağa ahenkli geliyor mon-keigh. Peki yoldaşların buna ne diyor?"
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader
